publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4744 Ms Maureen Watt: End the Handcuffing of Pregnant Prisoners—That the Parliament notes that the number of women prisoners being handcuffed during pregnancy has been reduced but believes that no woman should be handcuffed while in labour and calls on the Scottish Executive to put a halt to this situation, which puts women in an undignified, uncomfortable and inhumane position during an extremely difficult time.

S2M-4744 End the Handcuffing of Pregnant Prisoners (lodged on 4 September 2006) Michael Matheson*, Carolyn Leckie*, Stewart Stevenson*, Rob Gibson*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Jim Mather*, Christine Grahame*, Rosie Kane*, Ms Sandra White*, Brian Adam*, Tommy Sheridan*, Bruce Crawford*

S2M-4744 End the Handcuffing of Pregnant Prisoners (lodged on 4 September 2006) Eleanor Scott*, Chris Ballance*, Patrick Harvie*, Alex Neil*, John Swinburne*, Roseanna Cunningham*, John Farquhar Munro*

S2M-4744 Ms Maureen Watt: End the Handcuffing of Pregnant Prisoners—That the Parliament notes that the number of women prisoners being handcuffed during pregnancy has been reduced but believes that no woman should be handcuffed while in labour and calls on the Scottish Executive to put a halt to this situation, which puts women in an undignified, uncomfortable and inhumane position during an extremely difficult time. Supported by: Michael Matheson, Carolyn Leckie, Stewart Stevenson, Rob Gibson, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Jim Mather, Christine Grahame, Rosie Kane, Ms Sandra White, Brian Adam, Tommy Sheridan, Bruce Crawford, Eleanor Scott, Chris Ballance, Patrick Harvie, Alex Neil, John Swinburne, Roseanna Cunningham, John Farquhar Munro, Mr Adam Ingram*, Frances Curran*, Shiona Baird*
S2M-4744 End the Handcuffing of Pregnant Prisoners (lodged on 4 September 2006) Pauline McNeill*
S2M-4744 End the Handcuffing of Pregnant Prisoners (lodged on 4 September 2006) Fiona Hyslop*, Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-4744 End the Handcuffing of Pregnant Prisoners (lodged on 4 September 2006) Cathy Peattie*
